alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:57AM EDT until July 02 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES... At 1256 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ricketts Glen State Park to Central to Waller to Biggertown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jamison City, Waller and Central. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
